title: Menger Sponge Fractal
description: In this coding challenge, I attempt to code the Menger Sponge (fractals) using Processing.

timestamps.title: Welcome to a 10 minute Coding Challenge!
Quick math about the Menger Sponge
Code! Drawing a 3D box in Processing
Use a Box object instead of the hardcoded box
Chopping up one Box into multiple ones
Modeling the Menger Sponge as an ArrayList of Boxes
Generating the next iteration on mouse click
How to determine which boxes need to be removed?
Done! The Menger Sponge in Processing
